feed.title: 4ga Boards Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for 4ga Boards: 4ga Boards 3.2.2
entry.content:
Changes since last release: - 🐞 fix: Changed language name to just 'Portuges', lang code stays the same if somone want to develop portuguese portugal translation 121a737 - 💄 chore(deps): Bump http-proxy-middleware b8e820a - 📄 Merge pull request #567 from RARgames/dependabot/npm_and_yarn/client/npm_and_yarn-a274ede39d fda75ca - 💄 chore(deps): Bump webpack-dev-server from 5.2.0 to 5.2.1 in /client f276a15 - 📄 Merge pull request #560 from RARgames/dependabot/npm_and_yarn/client/webpack-dev-server-5.2.1 6d97685 - 💄 chore(deps): Bump eslint related packages, chai ed72494 - 💄 chore(deps-dev): Bump @testing-library/react in /client 7ec1c8b - 📄 Merge pull request #559 from RARgames/dependabot/npm_and_yarn/client/testing-library/react-16.3.0 b211425 - 💄 chore(deps): Bump dotenv from 16.4.7 to 16.5.0 in /server a7f470d - 📄 Merge pull request #561 from RARgames/dependabot/npm_and_yarn/server/dotenv-16.5.0 7153e97 - 💄 chore(deps): Bump sharp from 0.34.0 to 0.34.1 in /server 8836d34 - 📄 Merge pull request #562 from RARgames/dependabot/npm_and_yarn/server/sharp-0.34.1 9aa1a67 - 💄 chore(deps): Bump lint-staged from 15.5.0 to 15.5.1 8807f5a - 📄 Merge pull request #564 from RARgames/dependabot/npm_and_yarn/lint-staged-15.5.1 7d0c55d - 🌟 feat: [BREAKING]: Removed card_label_backup, label_backup from db (db update) d2cea3e - 💄 chore(deps): Bump postcss-preset-env from 10.1.5 to 10.1.6 in /client f7d604a - 📄 Merge pull request #568 from RARgames/dependabot/npm_and_yarn/client/postcss-preset-env-10.1.6 e618d6b - 💄 chore(deps): Bump @babel/core from 7.26.9 to 7.26.10 in /client 2d05e7c - 📄 Merge pull request #570 from RARgames/dependabot/npm_and_yarn/client/babel/core-7.26.10 b118e48 - 💄 chore(deps): Bump babel-loader from 9.2.1 to 10.0.0 in /client 1a4df8e - 📄 Merge pull request #571 from RARgames/dependabot/npm_and_yarn/client/babel-loader-10.0.0 2c9e472 - 💄 chore(deps): Bump @babel/runtime to 7.27.0 2cd44d3 - 💄 chore(deps): Bump eslint-related packages to 9.25.1 5c73e16 - 🌟 feat: Changed default popup open/close behavior, Added missing canEdit to Labels related popups 076c1d3 - 🐞 - 🌟 feat: Changed default modal open/close behavior, fix: TextFile upload modal e6ffd57 - 🌟 feat: Close all popups on ancestor scroll by default 9e9be31 - 🌟 feat: Added user count for UserSettings 20019e1 - 🐞 fix: Removed canEdit true by default in Memberships 7d776fe - 🐞 fix: PreferencesSettings current value 39b01c4 - 🌟 feat: ListVIew added additional place for ListView Settings ac8a33e - 🐞 fix: Added keepOnScroll for ListViewSettings 915ce61 - 🌟 feat: ListView reset sorting for column when hiding column d122245 - 🎨 style: ListView Add Card/List buttons 9ecbd53 - 🌟 feat: ListName -> List in ListView ec335a7 - 🐞 fix: MDEditor handle links without switching card/opening description 3a2ffab - 🌟 feat: ListView more column selection options c359ff4 - 🌟 feat: Added Card DueDate/Labels direct edit 00cb95e - 🐞 fix: Cursor for Labels, easier card switching for non editors 758392b - 🐞 fix: Cursor for DueDates, new disabled popup syntax 4762758 - 🐞 fix: Cursor, new disabled popup for Task Memberships, CardModal for non-editor fixes 2323f79 - 🐞 fix: Fixed card subscription for non-editor 477756e - 🐞 fix: ListView cursor pointer for every row for editor a79d918 - 💄 chore(deps): Bump @floating-ui/react to 0.27.8 c3c9a66 - 💄 chore(deps): removed unused packages, bump react-router to 7.5.2 1a9406f - 💄 chore(deps): Removed unused packages a60cf60 - 💄 chore(deps): Bump many packages f7d8eba - 🐞 fix: Fixed development mode stuck after error (after eslint-webpack-plugin update) 68a6d43 - 🌟 feat: ListView added resizer title 5b8d483 - 🐞 - 🌟 feat: Added container for Table, added isPaginated to Table.Wrapper for later use, fix: ListView minor fixes 0242fb4 - 🌟 feat: Switched PreferencesSettings to new Table f7d9241 - 🐞 fix: Fixed pt-BR translation always loaded by default 41145f9 - 🌟 feat: Table autoSize improvements, enabled autoSize on window resize 4867cbc - 🐝 refactor: use-table-hooks-pre, removed offset c645fbd - 🌟 feat: Table AutoSize columns is always pre-sizing with headerSize, changed Table paddings a4d9a6b - 🐞 fix: Call resize less frequent for ListView 9b22629 - 🌟 feat: Added closing other dropdown when opening a new one by default d146870 - 💄 chore(deps): Bump webpack from 5.99.6 to 5.99.7 in /client ec37bc3 - 📄 Merge pull request #577 from RARgames/dependabot/npm_and_yarn/client/webpack-5.99.7 82117ba - 💄 chore(deps): Bump @pmmmwh/react-refresh-webpack-plugin in /client 4ca2db4 - 📄 Merge pull request #578 from RARgames/dependabot/npm_and_yarn/client/pmmmwh/react-refresh-webpack-plugin-0.6.0 26237d2 - 🌟 feat: Moved Instance Settings to new Table ba74a65 - 🐞 fix: Table - not centered style fixes c3fb46b - 🌟 feat: DateCell added showUndefined 0e981b2 - 🌟 feat: Added ariaLabel for headerCell as an option for all tables 2157178 - 🌟 feat: Added new Table for UsersSettings, many other smaller changes (db update) 3eacb5a - 🐝 refactor: Simplified initialPageIndexRef pageSize for ListView 4251d19 - 💊 clean: Removed TableLegacy 484a075 - 🐞 fix: Fixed InputPassword icon click losing focus 5292f2d - 🐞 fix: Fixed UsersSettings actions button hover 0c7fba6 - 🌟 feat: Moved InstanceSettings, PreferencesSettings to SettingsCell cdbb881 - 💄 chore(deps): Bump eslint, babel related packages a425222 - 💊 clean: Removed not used imports 2f2492b - 🐞 [PATCH] fix: PL Translation missing . f53a918

Install this release using: docker pull ghcr.io/rargames/4gaboards:3.2.2

entry.title: New release for 4ga Boards: 4ga Boards 3.2.3
entry.content:
Changes since last release: - 🌟 feat: Added GitHub SSO 38b9c6e - 🌟 feat: Added Microsoft SSO 95b667f - 🐝 refactor: Simplified SSO workflow 435c813 - 🐞 fix: FIxed login ssoUrls b755cc8 - 🐞 fix: CardModal task add b2d711c - 🐞 fix: Fixed multiple popup style issues b0a03d6 - 🌟 feat: Added an option to assign password, email, username if user is only sso-based c3abbd8 - 🌟 feat: SSO standardized b11dcdd - 📖 [PATCH] docs: Readme 8407a8e

Install this release using: docker pull ghcr.io/rargames/4gaboards:3.2.3

entry.title: New release for 4ga Boards: 4ga Boards 3.2.4
entry.content:
Changes since last release: - 🐞 [PATCH] fix: SSO Login without displayName 3e2b48e

Install this release using: docker pull ghcr.io/rargames/4gaboards:3.2.4

entry.title: New release for 4ga Boards: 4ga Boards 3.2.5
entry.content:
Changes since last release: - 💄 chore(deps-dev): Bump eslint-config-prettier from 10.1.2 to 10.1.5, eslint-plugin-perfectionist from 4.12.3 to 4.13.0 f6df5fd - 💄 chore(deps): Bump bcrypt from 5.1.1 to 6.0.0 in /server 4f24653 - 💄 chore(deps): Bump lint-staged from 15.5.1 to 16.0.0 568aea4 - 💄 chore(deps): Bump i18next related-packages e491af9 - 💄 chore(deps): Bump react-router from 7.5.2 to 7.6.0 in /client cc239bc - 🌟 feat: Added optional env variables to docker compose, values.yaml, Added log level eea97e5 - 🌟 feat: Added option to disable creating projects by non-admin users bc1f432 - 🌟 feat: Disabled i18n server-side 44b4974 - 📖 - 📖 docs: Added DEMO_MODE to docker-cmpose, values.yaml, env.sample 89fbade - 🐞 fix: Fixed bug preventing adding due date to task on some browsers 924be6f - 🌟 feat: Marked current date on calendar 20d3287 - 🐝 refactor: focus preventScroll b1132d0 - 🐝 refactor: getting core settings 24e3e6a - 🐞 - 🌟 feat: Promote 4ga Boards GitHub in demo mode, fix: Calendar today color 2989c4a - 🎨 style: Changed Github link demo mode 324cca5 - 📄 [PATCH] Release 6563b6a

Install this release using: docker pull ghcr.io/rargames/4gaboards:3.2.5

entry.title: New release for 4ga Boards: 4ga Boards 3.2.6
entry.content:
Changes since last release: - 🌟 feat: Changed sidebar toggle location (for easier mobile access) 3683dd9 - 🐞 fix: Server-side check for localUserRegistration 774dc9d - 🐞 fix: Added proper check to send messageDismiss action less frequently 4a9c2b0 - 🌟 feat: Updated demo mode to get some feedback 9ede171 - 🌟 feat: Added default settings for registration and project creation fe75023 - 🐞 fix: Migration file name missing 4457ac3 - 🐞 - 🌟 feat: Added DEFAULT_ADMIN settings, fix: Some defaults inconsistencies 12200d9 - 📄 [PATCH] Release 1a79f0a

Install this release using: docker pull ghcr.io/rargames/4gaboards:3.2.6
